00002 import wx
00003 from OpenGL.GLUT import *
00004 from OpenGL.GLU import *

00006 init = 0

00008 class IGAGLCanvas(GLCanvas):
00009     def __init__(self, parent, data, tick = 100, size = (250, 250)):
00010         GLCanvas.__init__(self, parent, size = size, 
00011                 style=wx.DEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE|wx.NO_FULL_REPAINT_ON_RESIZE)
00012         wx.EVT_PAINT(self, self.OnPaint)
00013         wx.EVT_CHAR(self, self.OnKey)
00014 
00015         self.Bind(wx.EVT_SIZE, self.processSizeEvent, self)
00016         self.data = data
00017 
00018         self.zOffset = 0.
00019         self.InitGL()
00020         self.rtri = 0.0
00021         self.rquad = 0.0
00022 
00023         TIMER_ID = wx.NewId()
00024         self.timer = wx.Timer(self, TIMER_ID)  # message will be sent to the panel
00025         # milliseconds
00026         self.timer.Start(tick)
00027         wx.EVT_TIMER(self, TIMER_ID, self.tick)  # call the on_timer function
00028 
00029 #------------------------------------------#
00030     def Destroy(self):
00031         self.timer.Stop()
00032         GLCanvas.Destroy(self)
00033 
00034 #------------------------------------------#
00035     def tick(self, event):
00036         self.Refresh()
00037 
00038 #------------------------------------------#
00039     def OnKey(self, event):
00040         keycode = chr(event.GetKeyCode())
00041         if keycode == 'j':
00042             pass
00043         elif keycode == 'k':
00044             pass
00045         elif keycode == 'z':
00046             self.zOffset += 1.0
00047 
00048         self.Refresh()
00049         event.Skip()
00050 
00051 #------------------------------------------#
00052     def OnPaint(self,event):
00053         #dc = wx.PaintDC(self)
00054         self.SetCurrent()
00055         self.OnDraw()
00056 
00057 
00058 #------------------------------------------#
00059     def OnReshape(self, width, height):
00060         """
00061         Reshape the OpenGL viewport based on the dimensions of the window.
00062         """
00063         if height==0:
00064             height=1
00065         glViewport(0, 0, width, height)
00066         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION)
00067         glLoadIdentity()
00068         gluPerspective(45, 1.0*width/height, 0.1, 100.0)
00069         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW)
00070         glLoadIdentity()
00071 
00072     
00073 #------------------------------------------#
00074     def GetGLExtents(self):
00075         """Get the extents of the OpenGL canvas."""
00076         return self.GetClientSize()
00077 
00078 #------------------------------------------#
00079     def processSizeEvent(self, event):
00080         """Process the resize event.""" 
00081         if self.GetContext():
00082             # Make sure the frame is shown before calling SetCurrent.
00083             self.Show()
00084             self.SetCurrent()
00085             
00086             size = self.GetGLExtents()
00087             self.OnReshape(size.width, size.height)
00088             self.Refresh(False)
00089         event.Skip()
00090 
00091 
00092 #------------------------------------------#
00093     def OnDraw(self):
00094 
00095         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);     
00096         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST)
00097         glLoadIdentity();

00194     def InitGL(self):
00195         global init
00196         if not init:
00197             init = 1
00198 
00199             glutInit('')
00200             glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH)
00201             glClearColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00202             glClearDepth(1.0)
00203             glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST)
00204             glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL)
00205             glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST)
